{{NCAATeamSeason |Mode=Basketball |Year=2009â10 |Prev year=2008â09 |Next year=2010â11 |Team=Louisiana Tech Bulldogs |Image= Latechathleticslogo.jpg |Conference=Western Athletic Conference |Division= |ShortConference= WAC |CoachRank= |APRank= |Record=24â11 |ConfRecord=9â7 |HeadCoach=[[Kerry Rupp]] |AsstCoach1=Nikita Johnson |AsstCoach2=Curtis Condie |AsstCoach3=Dusty May |StadiumArena=[[Thomas Assembly Center]] |BowlTourney=[[2010 CollegeInsider.com Tournament|CIT]] |BowlTourneyResult=Quarterfinals }} {{2009â10 WAC men's basketball standings}} The '''2009â10 [[Louisiana Tech Bulldogs basketball]] team''' represented [[Louisiana Tech University]] in the [[2009â10 NCAA Division I men's basketball season|2009â10]] men's [[college basketball]] season. This was [[Kerry Rupp]]'s 3rd season as head coach. The Bulldogs played their home games at [[Thomas Assembly Center]] and compete in the [[2009-10 WAC men's basketball season|Western Athletic Conference]]. They finished the season 24–11, 9–7 in WAC play and lost in the semifinals of the [[2010 WAC Men's Basketball Tournament]]. They were invited to the [[2010 CollegeInsider.com Tournament]] where they advanced to the quarterfinals before falling to Missouri State. ==Pre-season== In the WAC preseason polls, released October 20 via media teleconferencehttp://www.wacsports.com/ViewArticle.dbml?SPSID=45988&SPID=4126&DB_LANG=C&DB_OEM_ID=10100&ATCLID=204817316 La Tech was selected to finish 5th in the coaches poll and 6th in the media poll. Sr. Kyle Gibson was selected to the coaches All-WAC second team. ==2009â10 Team== ===Roster=== Sourcehttp://www.latechsports.com/sports/m-baskbl/mtt/latc-m-baskbl-mtt.html {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 90%" !style="background: #e3e3e3;"|# !style="background: #e3e3e3;"|Name !style="background: #e3e3e3;"|Height !style="background: #e3e3e3;"|Weight (lbs.) !style="background: #e3e3e3;"|Position !style="background: #e3e3e3;"|Class !style="background: #e3e3e3;"|Hometown !style="background: #e3e3e3;"|Previous Team(s) |- |2 |Brandon Gibson |6'5" |225 |[[Guard (basketball)|G]] |So. |[[Marianna, FL]], [[United States|U.S.]] |[[Marianna High School|Marianna HS]] |- |3 |Jamel Guyton |6'3" |200 |[[Guard (basketball)|G]] |Sr. |[[Odessa, TX]], [[United Kingdom| U.S.]] |[[Odessa High School|Odessa HS]]

the week for the fourth week of the season with weekly averages of 27.5 PPG, 6.5 RPG, 4.0 AST, 1.5 Steals and 59.3 FG%.http://www.wacsports.com/ViewArticle.dbml?DB_LANG=C&DB_OEM_ID=10100&ATCLID=204845416 On January 4, So. Olu Ashaolu was named the WAC player of the week for the eighth week of the season with weekly averages of 15.5 PPG, 16.5 RPG, 1.5 AST, 0.5 Steals and 52.4 FG%.http://www.wacsports.com/ViewArticle.dbml?DB_LANG=C&DB_OEM_ID=10100&ATCLID=204864624 ==See also== *[[Louisiana Tech Bulldogs basketball]] *[[2009â10 WAC men's basketball season]] ==References== {{reflist}} [[Category:2009â10 Western Athletic Conference men's basketball season|Louisiana Tech]] [[Category:Louisiana Tech Bulldogs basketball seasons]]
